memtest.title: Memtest86+
memtest.description: MemTest86 is the original self booting memory testing software for x86 and ARM computers. Supporting both BIOS and UEFI
memtest.author: tftp-np

bibm.title: BootIt Bare Metal
bibm.description: Partition management, multi-boot OS management, cloning/backup/recovery of disks and partitions, running PC maintenance scripts, resetting Windows account passwords
bibm.author: Geralt

hddarts.title: HD Diagnostic and Repair Tools
hddarts.description: Diagnosis and correction of HDD-related problems.
hddarts.author: Geralt

clonezilla.title: Clonezilla
clonezilla.description: Clonezilla is a partition and disk imaging/cloning program similar to True ImageÂ®. It saves and restores only used blocks in hard drive. Two types of Clonezilla are available, Clonezilla live and Clonezilla SE (Server Edition).
clonezilla.author: tftp-np

pmagic.title: Parted Magic Free
pmagic.description: Parted Magic is a Linux distribution based on Slackware that comes with disk partitioning and data recovery tools.
pmagic.author: tftp-np

sysrescue.title: System Rescue CD
sysrescue.description: SystemRescue (formerly known as SystemRescueCd) is a Linux system rescue toolkit available as a bootable medium for administrating or repairing your system and data after a crash. It aims to provide an easy way to carry out admin tasks on your computer, such as creating and editing the hard disk partitions. It comes with a lot of Linux system utilities such as GParted, fsarchiver, filesystem tools and basic tools (editors, midnight commander, network tools).
sysrescue.author: tftp-np

redorescue.title: Redo rescue
redorescue.description: Redo Rescue, formerly Redo Backup and Recovery, is a free backup and disaster recovery software. It runs from a bootable Linux CD image, features a GUI that is a front end to the Partclone command line utility, and is capable of bare-metal backup and recovery of disk partitions. It can use external hard drives and network shares.
redorescue.author: tftp-np
